option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
filename of the grd format file. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Convert a grid format file to a grdmap format file.

description.p: Convert a grid format file to a grdmap format file.
The converted file is written to standard output.

example.description: Convert the grd format file "20040402.grd" to the grdmap format file "20040402.grdmap".
